5
Virgo Wine Tasting
Friday, September 5, 2025
6:00 PM
7:00 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Open to everyone ~ hosted by the GH Wine Club
We will be tasting our Virgo Season wine club wines!
Curious, responsible and rooted in ritual, Virgo knows that anything worth doing is worth doing
well.
Virgo is the fertilizer that causes the plant to shoot through the earth. Virgo season is all about the resounding impacts of small rituals and the beauty of practical routines.
To celebrate this season of grounding energy we’ve chosen one wine to represent the reflective, earthy energy of Virgo and one wine to represent Virgo’s ultimate match- dreamy, spiritual Pisces. Together they make a partnership that’s both deeply rooted and wildly transcendent- Virgo creates the structure and Pisces brings the soul.
Come, hang out, chat astrology and drink wine with us!
FREE for wine club members.
$10 for non-members

6
Sip & Script Beginners Calligraphy Class
Wednesday, August 6, 2025
6:30 PM
8:30 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join Sip & Script® for a Night of Learning Calligraphy!
Join us at
The Greenhouse
in
Jacksonville, FL
for a pretty lettering workshop
for beginners
! Whether you’re a stationery nerd, DIY Bride-to-be, or just a crafty individual, in this workshop you’ll be learning an introduction to modern calligraphy with a pointed dip pen and ink. We will cover all the basics and get you ready to add those unique lettered details to your snail mail,
Class includes one drink, 1.5 hours of instruction and demonstration, our beginner’s calligraphy kit (two nibs, black ink pot, 2 letter guides, tracing paper, and straight pen holder), and all materials to write on. Everything is yours to keep at the end of the workshop!
Feel free to come early, grab your seat, and purchase any food (food and drinks are available to purchase throughout class too!). The class will start promptly at
6:30 PM
!
this is a ticketed event hosted by sip & script
Sign up here

1
Wine Club Tasting Meetup (Leo Edition)
Friday, August 1, 2025
6:00 PM
10:00 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join the club!
We will be tasting our two Leo Season wine club wines
Inspired by the zodiac’s ultimate spotlight-seeker, we chose not one, but
two
wines that channel Leo vibes. Why? Because the perfect match for a Leo… is another Leo. Think of these wines as two Leos at the same party. Both unforgettable in their own way.
Leo is ruled by the Sun, and there’s no mistaking that solar-powered presence. They’re warm, expressive, and drawn to anything that lets them be fully seen. It’s not actually all ego- it’s about authenticity. They know who they are, and they don’t dim their light to make anyone else more comfortable.
Leo energy is like a spotlight cutting through the dark. It’s the golden heat that ripens fruit. Fireworks in your chest.
This season is about standing tall in your truth, feeling the pulse of your own heart like a drumbeat. It’s the sacred act of showing up as you are.
Come, hang out, chat astrology and drink wine with us!
FREE for wine club members.
$10 for non-members

24
Flutter & Frames
Thursday, July 24, 2025
6:00 PM
8:00 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Flutter & Frame Workshop: Create Your Own Shadow Box with Real Butterflies, Moths, and Nature's Beauty
Join us for a unique and creative workshop where you'll craft your very own shadow box featuring real butterflies or moths, dried flowers, moss, and an assortment of beautiful backgrounds. This hands-on experience is perfect for nature lovers, DIY enthusiasts, and anyone looking to create a one-of-a-kind piece of art.
In this workshop, you will learn how to arrange delicate butterflies and moths, combine them with dried flowers, moss, and other natural elements, and assemble them into a stunning shadow box. Our expert instructor will guide you through the process, offering tips on composition, preservation, and techniques for creating a visually striking design. By the end of the session, you'll leave with a beautifully crafted piece of art to display at home or give as a thoughtful gift.
All materials provided—just bring your curiosity and love for nature.
Get your tickets at www.thelostluna.com/events

Join the club!
We will be tasting our two Leo Season wine club wines
Inspired by the zodiac’s ultimate spotlight-seeker, we chose not one, but
two
wines that channel Leo vibes. Why? Because the perfect match for a Leo… is another Leo. Think of these wines as two Leos at the same party. Both unforgettable in their own way.
Leo is ruled by the Sun, and there’s no mistaking that solar-powered presence. They’re warm, expressive, and drawn to anything that lets them be fully seen. It’s not actually all ego- it’s about authenticity. They know who they are, and they don’t dim their light to make anyone else more comfortable.
Leo energy is like a spotlight cutting through the dark. It’s the golden heat that ripens fruit. Fireworks in your chest.
This season is about standing tall in your truth, feeling the pulse of your own heart like a drumbeat. It’s the sacred act of showing up as you are.
Come, hang out, chat astrology and drink wine with us!
FREE for wine club members.

Flutter & Frame Workshop: Create Your Own Shadow Box with Real Butterflies, Moths, and Nature's Beauty
Join us for a unique and creative workshop where you'll craft your very own shadow box featuring real butterflies or moths, dried flowers, moss, and an assortment of beautiful backgrounds. This hands-on experience is perfect for nature lovers, DIY enthusiasts, and anyone looking to create a one-of-a-kind piece of art.
In this workshop, you will learn how to arrange delicate butterflies and moths, combine them with dried flowers, moss, and other natural elements, and assemble them into a stunning shadow box. Our expert instructor will guide you through the process, offering tips on composition, preservation, and techniques for creating a visually striking design. By the end of the session, you'll leave with a beautifully crafted piece of art to display at home or give as a thoughtful gift.
All materials provided—just bring your curiosity and love for nature.
Get your tickets at www.thelostluna.com/events

Open to everyone ~ hosted by the GH Wine Club
We will be tasting our Virgo Season wine club wines!
Curious, responsible and rooted in ritual, Virgo knows that anything worth doing is worth doing
well.
Virgo is the fertilizer that causes the plant to shoot through the earth. Virgo season is all about the resounding impacts of small rituals and the beauty of practical routines.
To celebrate this season of grounding energy we’ve chosen one wine to represent the reflective, earthy energy of Virgo and one wine to represent Virgo’s ultimate match- dreamy, spiritual Pisces. Together they make a partnership that’s both deeply rooted and wildly transcendent- Virgo creates the structure and Pisces brings the soul.
Come, hang out, chat astrology and drink wine with us!
FREE for wine club members.
$10 for non-members

10:00 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
Jacksonville, fl 32202

Google Calendar
ICS
Join the club!
We will be tasting our two Leo Season wine club wines
Inspired by the zodiac’s ultimate spotlight-seeker, we chose not one, but
two
wines that channel Leo vibes. Why? Because the perfect match for a Leo… is another Leo. Think of these wines as two Leos at the same party. Both unforgettable in their own way.
Leo is ruled by the Sun, and there’s no mistaking that solar-powered presence. They’re warm, expressive, and drawn to anything that lets them be fully seen. It’s not actually all ego- it’s about authenticity. They know who they are, and they don’t dim their light to make anyone else more comfortable.
Leo energy is like a spotlight cutting through the dark. It’s the golden heat that ripens fruit. Fireworks in your chest.
This season is about standing tall in your truth, feeling the pulse of your own heart like a drumbeat. It’s the sacred act of showing up as you are.
Come, hang out, chat astrology and drink wine with us!
FREE for wine club members.
$10 for non-members

Flutter & Frames
Thursday, July 24, 2025
6:00 PM
8:00 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
Jacksonville, fl 32202
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Flutter & Frame Workshop: Create Your Own Shadow Box with Real Butterflies, Moths, and Nature's Beauty
Join us for a unique and creative workshop where you'll craft your very own shadow box featuring real butterflies or moths, dried flowers, moss, and an assortment of beautiful backgrounds. This hands-on experience is perfect for nature lovers, DIY enthusiasts, and anyone looking to create a one-of-a-kind piece of art.
In this workshop, you will learn how to arrange delicate butterflies and moths, combine them with dried flowers, moss, and other natural elements, and assemble them into a stunning shadow box. Our expert instructor will guide you through the process, offering tips on composition, preservation, and techniques for creating a visually striking design. By the end of the session, you'll leave with a beautifully crafted piece of art to display at home or give as a thoughtful gift.
All materials provided—just bring your curiosity and love for nature.
Get your tickets at www.thelostluna.com/events

Sip & Script Beginners Calligraphy Class
Wednesday, August 6, 2025
6:30 PM
8:30 PM
200 Riverside Ave Suite 2
Jacksonville, fl 32202
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join Sip & Script® for a Night of Learning Calligraphy!
Join us at
The Greenhouse
in
Jacksonville, FL
for a pretty lettering workshop
for beginners
! Whether you’re a stationery nerd, DIY Bride-to-be, or just a crafty individual, in this workshop you’ll be learning an introduction to modern calligraphy with a pointed dip pen and ink. We will cover all the basics and get you ready to add those unique lettered details to your snail mail,
Class includes one drink, 1.5 hours of instruction and demonstration, our beginner’s calligraphy kit (two nibs, black ink pot, 2 letter guides, tracing paper, and straight pen holder), and all materials to write on. Everything is yours to keep at the end of the workshop!
Feel free to come early, grab your seat, and purchase any food (food and drinks are available to purchase throughout class too!). The class will start promptly at
6:30 PM
!
this is a ticketed event hosted by sip & script
